# The `CSEMIRBuilder.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

This file implements the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/csemirbuilder">CSEMIRBuilder</a> class which CSEs as it builds instructions.
